# Load libraries

```{r}
library("tidyverse")
```

# Load and save data

```{r}
# Create directory
fs::dir_create(path = '../_raw')

# Retrieve data if it does not exist
raw_data <- read_tsv(file = "https://hbiostat.org/data/repo/nhgh.tsv")

# Write raw data to disc
write_tsv(x = raw_data,
          file = "../_raw/nhgh.tsv")
```
